amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, treated Mercury as a Pathogen Indicator.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in the Congressional Record to treat Mercury as a Pathogen Indicator.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kirk amendment as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Kirk amendment (A006) modified by unanimous consent. The modification to the amendment inserts a new section entitled, "Monitoring Protocol For Mercury."
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Kirk.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kirk amendment as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
